SELECT
DISTINCT
`tbsm`.* FROM tb_basic_sys_menu as `tbsm`
GROUP BY
`tbsm`.`#{field}`
HAVING #{tbBasicSysMenuPo.havingClause}

SELECT COALESCE(SUM(
DISTINCT
`tbsm`.`id`), 0) as result FROM tb_basic_sys_menu as `tbsm`
GROUP BY
`tbsm`.`#{groupField}`
